name: Flight
description: Let go your earthly tether. Enter the void. Empty and become wind.

name: Flying Bison's Disciple
description: Airbenders learned their art from the flying bison.

name: Like A Leaf In The Wind
description: The key is to be like the leaf flow with the movement of the gates.
imagepath: com/avatarduel/card/image/skill/Like A Leaf In The Wind.png

name: Spiritual Projection
description: It's a high-level airbender move. With a little spiritual stuff thrown in.

name: Badgermole's Disciple
description: Earthbenders learned their art from the badgermoles.

name: Earth Tunneling
description: Earthbenders can move through the earth to out-maneuver their foes literally swimming through the ground.

name: Seismic Sense
description: I see with earthbending. It's kind of like seeing with my feet. I feel the vibrations in the Earth and I can see where everything is.

name: Tectonics
description: I created Kyoshi Island so my people could be safe from invaders.

name: Dragon's Disciple
description: Firebenders learned their art from the dragons.

name: Jet Propulsion
description: Skilled firebending masters are able to conjure huge amounts of flame to propel themselves at high speeds.

name: Sun Warrior
description: Fire is life, not just destruction.

name: The Dancing Dragons
description: Don't you see? These aren't dance moves. These statues are giving us a lesson. I think this is some kind of Sun Warrior firebending form.

name: Moon's Disciple
description: Waterbenders learned their art from the moon and ocean.

name: Octopus Form
description: A body of water formed around the user into multiple whip-like limbs which can be used to grasp or strike an opponent or to intercept incoming attacks.

name: Water Cloak
description: A waterbender can use their water as a form of armor with tentacle-like arms.

name: Waterbending Scroll
description: An authentic illustrated document that provides a guide for waterbenders wishing to learn combative techniques and forms.

name: Grant Bending
description: In the age of Raava the Lion Turtles would grant humans power over the elements to protect themselves.

name: Harmonic Convergence
description: Once every ten-thousand years Raava and Vaatu would do battle. The victor would reign over the world for ten-thousand years.

name: Restore Bending
description: What was once lost can be regained.

name: Spirit Fusion
description: The Avatar gained their power by merging their reincarnation soul with the light spirit Raava.
